1.name: Centaur Slayer
1.description: A few more centaur herds are thinned out.

36.name: Imp Slayer
36.description: Don't worry. Demon blood is easy to wash out.

56.name: Focus Master
56.description: Only fools see this as an ornament. Only a master knows how to channel magic through it.
56.requirement: Deliver  killing blows with a focus.

92.name: Weaponsmith
92.requirement: Reach rating  in the weaponsmith discipline.

101.name: Ascalon Explorer
101.description: You've explored the ancestral territory of the charr.

bits.text: Plains of Ashford: Ascalon City Ruins
Plains of Ashford: Old Duke's Estate
Plains of Ashford: Village of Smokestead
Plains of Ashford: The Toppled Wall
Black Citadel: War Wagon Prep Deck
Iron Marches: Sunken Halls of Clarent
Fields of Ruin: Stronghold of Ebonhawke
Fields of Ruin: The Siege Plains
Fields of Ruin: The Ogre Road
Fields of Ruin: Last Stand Shelter
Diessa Plateau: Village of Butcher's Block

119.name: Legend of the Mists
119.description: You follow the tradition of a long line of heroes.
119.requirement: Earn  points in the Hall of Monuments.

193.name: Griffonrook Run
193.description: Cross the spires of Griffonrook Run.

342.name: That Had to Burn
342.description: Good thing we built this megalaser here.
342.requirement: Fire the megalaser at Tequatl the Sunless.

592.name: Southsun Lava Sample Collection
592.description: Collect a sample from the lava pool in the Karka Hive.

716.name: Kite Bombing
716.requirement: Find the large kite hidden in Griffonrook Run in Lornar's Pass.

730.name: I Like Kiel
730.requirement: Contribute one support token for Ellen Kiel on board the Zephyr Sanctum.

792.name: Hot-Air Balloonist
792.requirement: Travel by hot-air balloon to Divinity's Reach.

810.name: Meatless Murderer
810.requirement: Defeat Strugar and Chomper while denying Chomper any delicious meat.

860.name: Woodpecker
860.requirement: Destroy all tree stumps in World 2 Tribulation Mode.

1112.name: The Nightmares Within
1112.requirement: Complete  event inside the Tower of Nightmares.

1217.name: Aftermath Toxic Gardener I
1217.requirement: Aid in the destruction of toxic offshoots.

1269.name: Spreading Wintersday Joy II
1269.description: Make the lives of the less fortunate in Divinity's Reach a little better.
1269.requirement: Make a donation to Ho-Ho-Tron in Divinity's Reach.

1324.name: Boss Thumper VIII
1324.requirement: Participate in either the fight against the twisted marionette in Lornar's Pass or the fight against the great jungle wurms on Bloodtide Coast.

1387.name: Group Effort IV
1387.description: Mission: The Battle for Lion's Arch
1387.requirement: Participate in reclaiming one of the city's major districts during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

1650.name: No Seraph Left Behind
1650.description: Story Instance: Disturbance in Brisban Wildlands
1650.requirement: Don't let any of the Seraph repair workers perish.

1657.name: Fire for Effect
1657.requirement: Kill five Inquest with one barrage from Scarlet's turrets.

1747.name: Zodiac Weapon Collection
1747.description: <c=@flavor>Will you unlock the mystery of the stars after collecting all these skins? Only one way to find out.</c>
1747.requirement: Unlock all  Zodiac weapon skins in your wardrobe.

1832.name: Invisible Infiltration
1832.requirement: Complete "Meeting the Asura" without being detected after the initial skirmish.

1880.name: Daily Grounded Minidungeon
1880.requirement: Complete the Grounded minidungeon in Cursed Shore.

1915.name: Daily Tribulation Caverns Jumping Puzzle
1915.requirement: Complete the Tribulation Caverns jumping puzzle in Dredgehaunt Cliffs.

1947.name: Daily Sparkfly Fen Event Completer
1947.requirement: Complete events in Sparkfly Fen in the Maguuma Jungle.

2087.name: Shadow Weapon Collection
2087.requirement: Unlock all  Shadow weapon skin in your wardrobe.

2116.name: Daily Warrior or Mesmer Winner
2116.requirement: Win  PvP match as a warrior or mesmer.

2147.name: Verdant Brink Insight: Creaking Cavern
2147.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Verdant Brink.

2222.name: Verdant Brink Explorer
2222.requirement: Explore all areas in Verdant Brink.

2356.name: Bolt II: The Perfected Sword
2356.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor Zap has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn his needs for the war effort.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secret to weighting a blade.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the secret to balancing a hilt.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secrets of superior forging tools.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2390.name: The Flameseeker Prophecies II: The Perfected Shield
2390.description: Your first attempt at crafting the legendary precursor The Chosen has been modestly successful but has not yet yielded the weapon you ultimately desire. This journey has only just begun. Find a teacher, research your procedures, and hone your skills before you try a second time.

bits.text: Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secret to weighting a shield boss.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the art of forging.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to discover the secret to balancing a shield backing.
Speak to a Master Weaponsmith to learn the secrets of superior forging tools.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Desert Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Jungle Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Old World Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Ancient Water Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Herbal Magics.
Speak to Scholar Mossi in the Trader's Forum in Lion's Arch to learn her needs for applied research in Stabilizing Magics.
Purchased from Grandmaster Craftsman Hobbs after training the Magister of Legends ability in the Legendary Crafting Mastery Track.

2405.name: Daily Recommended FractalScale 4
2405.requirement: Complete  scale 4 fractal in the Fractals of the Mists through the portal in Lion's Arch.

2443.name: Buried Insight
2443.requirement: Search for ancient research on the Elder Dragons.

2681.name: League EngineerChampion
2681.description: Completing this achievement advances the League ProfessionChampion achievement.
2681.requirement: Win 7 ranked matches as an engineer.

2744.name: League ElementalistVeteran
2744.description: Completing this achievement advances the League ProfessionVeteran achievement.
2744.requirement: Win 5 ranked matches as an elementalist.

2745.name: League RevenantElite
2745.description: Completing this achievement advances the League ProfessionElite achievement.
2745.requirement: Win 10 ranked matches as a revenant.

2826.name: The Big Sleep
2826.requirement: Defeat the cave monster and release the magic that corrupted it.

2907.name: Daily Tier 2 Urban Battleground
2907.requirement: Complete Urban Battleground at fractal scale 26 or higher.

2909.name: Daily Tier 2 Aetherblade
2909.requirement: Complete Aetherblade at fractal scale 26 or higher.

2919.name: Daily Adventure: Salvage Pit
2919.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

2954.name: Daily Tier 1 Solid Ocean
2954.requirement: Complete Solid Ocean at fractal scale 1 or higher.

2955.name: Daily Tier 2 Molten Furnace
2955.requirement: Complete Molten Furnace at fractal scale 26 or higher.

2980.name: Daily Adventure: A Fungus Among Us
2980.requirement: Open the bronze daily reward chest from this adventure!

3015.name: Informed Politics
3015.requirement: Investigate posters in Kryta's towns and villages to stay up to date on public opinion.

3027.name: Keadin's Study
3027.requirement: In Blazeridge Steppes, successfully stop the Inquest from capturing  ley-line coalescences after contributing ley energy to the Priory.

3041.name: Seaside Victory
3041.description: To the victor go the seashells.
3041.requirement: Win  rated match on Revenge of the Capricorn.

3130.name: Trip to the Circus
3130.description: Journal: Trip to the Circus Completed
3130.requirement: Turn on the dwarven machine near the shipwrecked circus.

3131.name: Collecting Coalescence
3131.requirement: Participate in each of the coalescence events around the island.

bits.text: Lava Flats: To the south of the caldera wall.
Osprey Pillars: On the southeastern coast.
Burning Grotto: On the outer east side of the furnace chamber.

3165.name: New Afterlife for Quaggan
3165.requirement: Donate enough pieces of candy corn to give Drooburt a new start.

3182.name: Elixir Recipe
3182.requirement: Collect all items on the ingredient list for the elixir.

3217.name: Bitterfrost Frontier Insight: The Svanir Hive
3217.requirement: Discover this Maguuma Mastery Insight in Bitterfrost Frontier.

3365.name: Holding Back the Tide
3365.requirement: Defend key areas of Doric's Landing from White Mantle attackers.

3386.name: Cut Off the Head
3386.description: Cut off the head and its body will die.
3386.requirement: Participate as a member of a team that kills the enemy lord in rated Legacy of the Foefire and wins the match  time.

3391.name: Knight of the Thorn
3391.requirement: Become blessed by the Pale Tree as the bearer of Caladbolg.

3429.name: Lessons Learned
3429.requirement: Find all 14 of the golemancer's lost recordings in Draconis Mons.

3445.name: Awakening the Druid Stone
3445.description: Continue to cultivate your relationship with nature through tributes to the druid spirits of Draconis Mons.

bits.text: Dropped by the Greater Wardbough in Draconis Mons.
Bring the Wardbough Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Given by the Restless Arboreal Spirit in Brisban Wildlands.
Bring the Arboreal Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Dropped by the Rotting Ancient Oakheart in Queensdale.
Bring the Oakheart Runestone to Kodama in Draconis Mons.
Bring 3 Fire Orchids to Kodama in the Savage Rise.
Bring 3 Fire Orchids to Liriodendron in the watering hole of the Savage Rise.
Bring 3 Fire Orchids to Broadleaf on a ledge above the Savage Rise.
Bring 3 Fire Orchids to Rosewood on a ledge above the Ancient Hollow.

3466.name: Daily Siren's Landing: Shrine Surveyor
3466.description: Working to keep the lights on.
3466.requirement: Power each shrine in Siren's Landing.

3476.name: Malchor's Leap Insight: Scavenger's Chasm
3476.requirement: Discover this Mastery Insight in Malchor's Leap.

3602.name: Mummy Legion
3602.requirement: Have at least 15 mummies under your command.

3684.name: Master Firebrand
3684.requirement: Completely train the guardian's firebrand elite specialization.

3741.name: Race to the Finish: Desert Highlands
3741.requirement: Finish the race around Brightwater Inlet in first, second, or third place.

3743.name: Desert Highlands Champion Bounties
3743.requirement: Defeat each champion bounty in the Highlands at least once.

3788.name: Breaking the Bank: Vault 1
3788.requirement: Guess the correct chest in the first mysterious bank vault.

3823.name: Smashing!
3823.description: Defeat Ellutherius Wintergust without being hit by his pot attacks, three consecutive times.

3860.name: Bleeding Heart
3860.description: Help the nomads in Diviner's Reach by completing all their task requests five different times.

3873.name: Elon Riverlands Griffon Expert: Silver
3873.requirement: Fly your griffon through the rings as quickly as you can!

3919.name: Courtly Service
3919.requirement: Tithe  gold commissioning services for the Mad King's Labyrinth.

3965.name: Timing Is Everything
3965.requirement: Make it to the other side of the Vestibule of Faith and pull the levers unscathed.

4020.name: Silencer
4020.requirement: Complete all other achievements in the Hall of Chains raid instance.

bits.text: Defeat the Soulless Horror in challenge mode.
Defeat the Soulless Horror without being hit by Vortex Slash or Hurricane Slash.
Complete the River of Souls event.
Complete the Statue of Ice event.
Complete the Statue of Darkness event.
Complete the Statue of Death and Resurrection event.
Complete all three statue events within 5 minutes.
Defeat the Voice in the Void.
Defeat the Voice in the Void on challenge mode.

4036.name: Sore Eyes
4036.requirement: Complete the Statue of Darkness event.

4045.name: (Annual) Festival Automaton
4045.requirement: Defeat Toxx in Tixx's Infinirarium in Divinity's Reach. Achievement can be completed once per year.

4066.name: Golden Firestarter
4066.requirement: Earn a gold medal in the Firecracker Lighting adventure in Divinity's Reach.

4107.name: Inquest-Specimen Liberator
4107.requirement: Release the healthy control specimens from lab Sigma-05.

4109.name: Drones Disabled
4109.requirement: Disable the drones in lab Sigma-05.

4121.name: Race to the Finish: Olmakhan Docks
4121.requirement: Finish the race around the Olmakhan village docks in first, second, or third place.

4160.name: (Annual) World 2 Challenge
4160.description: If you never climb, you'll never see the view from the top.
4160.requirement: Complete Zone 1, Zone 2, and Zone 3 in World 2 in Tribulation Mode.

4203.name: Dances with Cacti
4203.description: You showed those choya how it's done!
4203.requirement: Show the choya what real dance moves look like.

4210.name: Daily Tier 3 Deepstone
4210.requirement: Complete Deepstone at fractal scale 51 or higher.

4250.name: Domain of Kourna Griffon Master: Silver
4250.requirement: Earn this achievement by opening the silver chest.

4271.name: High Roller
4271.requirement: Find the items Gorrik needs to buff up his beetle.

4290.name: Humble Victor
4290.requirement: Win a third tier challenge with active Frailty and Squeamish gambits.

4334.name: Boss Blitz
4334.requirement: Complete  Boss Blitz meta-event in the Crown Pavilion.

4338.name: Mad Realm Weapon Collection
4338.requirement: Unlock all  Mad Realm weapon skin in your wardrobe.

4441.name: Mad King's Herald (Intern)
4441.requirement: Complete laps of any race event or time trial in Mad King's Raceway.

4471.name: Rolling Competitor: Infernal Leap
4471.requirement: Complete 15 laps of the roller beetle race in Mount Maelstrom. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

4513.name: Dragonsblood
4513.requirement: Create and test a prototype Dragonsblood weapon.

4515.name: Honored Ritual
4515.requirement: Remind Niles about the honored ritual of the Zephyrites.

4519.name: Chasing Tales: Preemptive Strike
4519.description: Baverne could wipe entire squads without being detected.
4519.requirement: Defeat 10 enemies with a rifle in Thunderhead Peaks without taking damage.

bits.text: Defeated 10 enemies with a rifle without taking damage in Thunderhead Peaks.

4531.name: Chasing Tales: A Light in the Dark
4531.description: Haliver would go where no other would.
4531.requirement: Defeat 30 enemies while wielding a torch in Thunderhead Peaks.

bits.text: Defeated 30 enemies with a torch in Thunderhead Peaks.

4591.name: Expert Archaeologist
4591.requirement: Categorize 20 artifacts for Olaf and Elof in Deldrimor Ruins.

4652.name: Super Adventurer's Quest
4652.requirement: Find secret items in the Adventure Box to trade your way to a new upgrade!

4744.name: Glory of Dragons
4744.requirement: Teach a skyscale to trust you.

4801.name: Storm Chaser
4801.description: Don't let a windbag blow you off course.

4808.name: Charged Winds
4808.description: Bewarethis little breeze is high voltage.
4808.requirement: Defeat Cardinal Sabir without being hit by a voltaic wisp's Electrospark skill.

4817.name: Eye Survived
4817.requirement: Defeat an Eye of Zhaitan at difficulty 3 in Dragon Arena (Private).

4820.name: (Annual) Going the Distance
4820.requirement: Complete 15 laps in the mount race in Hoelbrak (race event or adventure). Finishing all 3 laps of the race event grants extra progress. This achievement can be completed once per year.

4879.name: (Annual) Zephyrite Lost and Found
4879.requirement: Loot fallen Zephyrite kite baskets throughout Tyria. This achievement can be completed once every year.

4888.name: Bonus Event: Daily Champion RushShiverpeaks
4888.requirement: Defeat a champion-rank enemy in Wayfarer Foothills, Snowden Drifts, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, Timberline Falls, or Frostgorge Sound.

4915.name: Crater Circuit: Silver Challenge
4915.requirement: Finish the Crater Circuit within the Silver Challenge time limit.

4951.name: Secrets of the Khan-Ur
4951.requirement: Open a long-hidden vault and loot what's inside.

4978.name: Light it up!
4978.requirement: Ignite the Flame Legion effigy 10 times in the Effigy event.

5152.name: League Conqueror2v2 Season One
5152.requirement: Win  ranked matches during 2v2 Season One.

5210.name: Priority Strike: Whisper of Jormag
5210.requirement: Defeat the Whisper of Jormag in the Whisper of Jormag Strike Mission.

5226.name: Visions of the Past: Mysteries of the Eye
5226.description: Complete this to unlock key moments of Living World Season 1.
5226.requirement: Read a mysterious message in the Eye of the North after completing the "Steel and Fire" story content.

5300.name: Special Mission: Thirsty Work
5300.requirement: Bring water to  exhausted sentries in allied bases around the Drizzlewood Coast.
5300.locked_text: Unlock by using Blood Legion Special Mission Documents.

5339.name: Special Mission: Enjoy the Silence
5339.requirement: Destroy  propaganda speakers in Drizzlewood Coast.
5339.locked_text: Unlock by using Ash Legion Special Mission Documents.

5386.name: The Ghost
5386.requirement: Plant the charges without being spotted by Dominion forces.

5402.name: Special Mission: Blast Them All
5402.requirement: Strike 5 or more targets with a single remote charge  times.

5424.name: Ears Wide Open
5424.description: Charr have four ears, but it doesn't hurt to have a few extra.
5424.requirement: Plant all of the listening devices at strategic locations throughout Northern Drizzlewood Coast.

bits.text: Speak with Cato Snapjaw to collect the listening devices.
Strategic Location 1: Behind a tent in the southern Dominion camp.
Strategic Location 2: Tucked under a charr vehicle in the central Dominion camp.
Strategic Location 3: At the foot of a wooden tower behind stacked crates in the northern Dominion camp.
Strategic Location 4: Among some rocks below the northernmost comm tower.
Strategic Location 5: In bushes just below the northeast exit from the cave system.
Strategic Location 6: Near the northern artillery position at Canopy Crag.
Strategic Location 7: Near bushes by the central comm tower.
Strategic Location 8: Next to the northern end of the bridge.
Strategic Location 9: Behind a tree high on a plateau in the southeast, facing the lighthouse.
Strategic Location 10: In some bushes along the main causeway.
Strategic Location 11: On an outcrop of rocks northeast of the southern Dominion camp.

5457.name: Complement the Creator
5457.description: Teamwork makes the dream...well, you get it.
5457.requirement: Complete a daily strike with an ArenaNet employee.

5473.name: League ConquerorConquest Season Twenty-Four
5473.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Four.

5503.name: Flame vs. Frost
5503.requirement: Complete the story chapter Flame vs. Frost.

5556.name: Deldrimor Supporter
5556.requirement: Purchase  dwarven supply boxes at the Eye of the North.

5564.name: Daily: Tengu Special
5564.requirement: Recover  tengu cultural relic from defeated enemies in Drizzlewood Coast.

5630.name: Daily Caledon Forest Dragon Response Mission
5630.requirement: Complete the Caledon Forest Dragon Response Mission.

5655.name: League ParticipatorConquest Season Twenty-Six
5655.requirement: Play  ranked matches during Conquest Season Twenty-Six.

5671.name: Etherbound Weapon Collection
5671.requirement: Unlock all  Etherbound weapon skin in your wardrobe.

5695.name: Light Him Up
5695.requirement: During the Dragonstorm encounter, attack Primordus  time while he is exposed.

5718.name: Revisiting the Hidden Grove
5718.requirement: Reach the peach grove and consume its fruit.

5732.name: Return to A Shadow's Deeds
5732.requirement: Complete the mission A Shadow's Deeds in Living World Season 3 Episode 1.

5800.name: Second Dive: Hot Splashes
5800.requirement: Acquire diving goggles near the gate of fire, and dive into the bucket floating in the boiling sea.

5969.name: Adventurous Spirit: Sandswept Isles
5969.requirement: Complete any adventure in the Sandswept Isles.

5992.name: Crop Harvester: Sandswept Isles
5992.requirement: Harvest plants  times in the Sandswept Isles.

6000.name: Bounty Hunter: Domain of Istan
6000.requirement: Complete bounties within the Domain of Istan.

6108.name: Ministry-Approved Harbinger
6108.requirement: Purchase these  trinkets from the strike rewards vendor.

6155.name: Daily Echovald Wilds Jade Brotherhood Slayer
6155.requirement: Kill 25 Jade Brotherhood in Echovald Wilds.

6179.name: Shiverpeaks Fisher
6179.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
6179.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways of the Shiverpeaks.

6196.name: Cull the Corruption
6196.requirement: Destroy  malfunctioning jade mechs in New Kaineng City.

6307.name: Priority Cantha Strike: Harvest Temple
6307.requirement: Complete the Harvest Temple Strike Mission.

6381.name: The End of the Celestial Ministry
6381.description: "The Celestial Ministry ruled with an iron fist. Now...now they've scattered to the winds."Hui
6381.requirement: Assist Hui in gathering a history of the Celestial Ministers.

bits.text: Meet with Hui and accept his request.
Speak to Xiaobo, the descendant of Minister Jaisan.
Search the archives for Xiaobo's family history.
Return to Hui with the document about the Ministry of Earth.
Speak to Ju, the descendant of Minister Nai.
Find rare flowers for Ju to get in her good graces.
Return Ju's family history to Hui.
Speak to Suyin, the descendant of Minister Tao.
Disrupt the Jade Brotherhood in Kaineng City to get in Suyin's good graces.
Disrupt Purist activity in Kaineng City for Hui.
Return to Hui to discuss your findings.
Speak to Suyin to get her family history.
Speak to Ju to receive her family history.

6398.name: Cleanup Duty
6398.requirement: Erase  Jade Brotherhood graffiti in New Kaineng City.

6423.name: Playing with the Infants
6423.description: Our guardians said we could play here!
6423.requirement: Play with all of the shrine guardian infants in Gyala Delve at least once.

bits.text: Listening to the sounds of a waterfall.
Pretending to be a giant hermit crab.
At the bottom of a ravine.
Likes to watch jade being cut down.
Camping around a crashed mining rig.

6428.name: New Kaineng City Mastery
6428.description: As long as the Canthan people stand, so will Kaineng.

6552.name: League ConquerorConquest Season Thirty-Two
6552.requirement: Win  ranked matches during Conquest Season Thirty-Two.

6714.name: Decade of Champions: The Shatterer
6714.requirement: Defeat the Shatterer in Lowland Burns in the Blazeridge Steppes.

6715.name: Viewing Vistas III
6715.requirement:
View / vista in the Fields of Ruin, Blazeridge Steppes, Lornar's Pass, Dredgehaunt Cliffs, or the Harathi Hinterlands.

<c=@reminder>Vistas are scenic locations that show the world from a new perspective, and they are marked with a red triangle icon on the map.</c>

6732.name: Decade of Champions: Fire Elemental
6732.requirement: Defeat the fire elemental in the Thaumanova Reactor in Metrica Province.

6742.name: Decade of Battle: Player vs. Player
6742.requirement: Complete  PvP matches in unranked or ranked arenas.

6763.name: Toxic Krait Transcriber
6763.requirement: Speak with Priory Arcanist Dolja at Thunder Ridge camp during Season 1 Episode 4 to receive an obelisk transcriber.

6795.name: Assault Breaker
6795.requirement: Participate in defeating the assault knight trio during the Battle for Lion's Arch.

6972.name: Bringing Balance
6972.description: Books are stacked on the left, paper and pens to the right... Everything had its place on Lyhr's deskeven a rusted stein, sitting atop an old journal with the letter "R" carved on its leatherbound spine.
6972.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of Balance.

bits.text: Escort Lyhr to the Great Debate Hall so he can rebalance himself.
Bring order to the Great Debate Hall by defeating Kryptis and smashing the gavel.
Engage the avatars and free the Bastion of Balance.

6974.name: Nurture Knowledge
6974.requirement: Successfully complete events in the Bastion of Knowledge.

bits.text: Prepare for the Kryptis assault on the gates.
Aid the Astral Ward in defending or retaking the Bastion Gates.
Root out evidence that some of the library archivists are possessed.
Defeat the Avatar of Gluttony before it absorbs the knowledge of Amnytas.

7032.name: A Chapter Closed
7032.requirement: Speak with all your allies in the Wizard's Tower.

7065.name: Skyscale Target Practice in Skywatch Archipelago: Gold
7065.requirement: Earn a gold medal or better in the Skyscale Target Practice in Skywatch Archipelago adventure.

7144.name: Echoes of the Obscure
7144.requirement: Learn more about the Bastion of the Obscure and a legendary hero to acquire a powerful and ancient weapon.

bits.text: Purchase an Essence of the Obscure from the Faction Provisioner at the Bastion of the Obscure
Fight Off the Kryptis's Attempts to Possess Players in the Bastion of the Obscure
Learn More about the Echo of the Past by Speaking to Head Experimenter Rhianwyn
Learn More about Turai's Presence in the Bastion of the Obscure by Reading His Journal
Combine an Echo of the Past, an Echo of Turai, an Essence of the Obscure, and an Ossa's Crusader Inscription in the Mystic Forge
Travel to the Durmand Priory in Lornar's Pass and Infuse the Artifact with the Heart of the Priory

7148.name: Hide-and-Seek in the Wizard's Tower: Master
7148.requirement: Find the hiding djinn in the Wizard's Tower within 60 seconds.

7177.name: Skywatch Archipelago Insight: Southern Clearing
7177.requirement: Discover this Secrets of the Obscure Mastery Insight in Skywatch Archipelago.

7184.name: Thunderhead Keep Rift Hunting
7184.requirement: Take down tier 1, tier 2, and tier 3 rift hunt targets in Thunderhead Keep.

7204.name: The Feeling Is Mutual
7204.description: Tell me how you really feel.
7204.requirement: Collect essence of emotion during the Unlocking the Wizard's Tower meta-event.

7227.name: Uncertain Times
7227.requirement: Deal with questions from a new source.

7247.name: Sparkfly Fen Incursions
7247.requirement: Repel Kryptis incursions in Sparkfly Fen.

7249.name: Assist Lyhr
7249.requirement: Assist Lyhr in getting to the Hall of Confluence.

7645.name: League Participator2v2 Season Ten
7645.requirement: Play  ranked matches during 2v2 Season Ten.

7705.name: Behind Demon Lines
7705.description: Chaos meets surprising beauty in the Realm of Dreams.
7705.requirement: Successfully complete unique events in Heitor's territory in Inner Nayos.

bits.text: Defeat the champion Avatar of Rage.
Defeat the Kryptis before they open a rift into Tyria.
Prevent the Kryptis from repairing the extractor.
Escort the recon team as they investigate unusual Kryptis activity. (Event 1 of 2)
Find and destroy the tendrils of Nourys. (Event 1 of 3)
Use your skyscale to intercept magic around the extractor. (Event 2 of 3)
Defend Lieutenant Sejana Forgewill by fighting off Kryptis.
Find and defeat the Kryptis patrol leaders. (Event 1 of 4)
Collect the remains of the Astral Ward defenses. (Event 2 of 4)
Defend the turrets from being destroyed. (Event 3 of 4)

7715.name: Hero's Origin: Caledon Forest
7715.requirement:
Complete events in Caledon Forest in the Maguuma Jungle.

<c=@reminder>You can find events while exploring the world. Events are marked by an orange circle on your map when you're nearby.</c>

7794.name: Danced with the Stars
7794.requirement: Complete the Cosmic Observatory Strike Mission with challenge mode active and without being hit by Spinning Nebula.

7797.name: Better Consumer Than Consumed
7797.description: Wild bristlefruit provides all the essential vitamins and nutrients a growing Kryptis needs.

7799.name: Inner Nayos: Nyedra Surrounds Savior
7799.description: You can rest at ease knowing you've helped out everywhere in Nyedra Surrounds.
7799.requirement: Complete event-completion achievements throughout Nyedra Surrounds in Inner Nayos.

7804.name: Avid Horn of Maguuma Fisher
7804.description: <c=@flavor>The charm of fishing is in pursuing something elusive, though attainable. It is a simple yet profound practice of hope.</c>
7804.requirement: Collect  different fish from the waterways around the Horn of Maguuma.

7897.name: Heights of Glory
7897.requirement: Complete  achievements in the Heights of Glory category.

7975.name: Ring of Fire Veteran
7975.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8089.name: Wavering Ward
8089.description: A full party of five must participate in the fractal from start to finish without dying.
8089.requirement: Accept the harbinger's challenge and complete the Lonely Tower fractal without anyone in your group being defeated.

8092.name: Seafarer's Rest Veteran
8092.requirement: Purchase and use a corresponding world title.

8189.name: Scouting for Scouts
8189.requirement: Find the missing scouting party within the time limit.

8206.name: Feeding Trolls
8206.description: I'm useless until I've had my toast and eggs. Throw those trolls a bone!
8206.requirement: Help the kodan feed the lowland trolls 20 times.

8318.name: Mulch Master
8318.description: Where others see waste, you see an opportunity to leap into action!

8354.name: Scouting the Vale: Bronze
8354.requirement: Earn a bronze medal in the Scouting the Vale adventure.

8409.name: Road of Victory VI
8409.requirement: Earn Proofs of Glory through high placement in monthly tournaments.

8412.name: Daily Domain of Kourna
8412.requirement: Complete  events in Domain of Kourna.

8415.name: Return to Season 4
8415.requirement: Complete  achievements from the Return to Season 4 event.

8663.name: Rolling Racer: Lakeside Loop (Weekly)
8663.requirement: Complete a lap of the roller beetle race in Gendarran Fields within the time limit. (This achievement can be completed in the race event or adventure.)

8667.name: Reliving End of Dragons
8667.requirement: Complete pivotal story missions from End of Dragons.

bits.text: In the Name of the Law

8707.name: Agonizing Cold
8707.requirement: Complete the Kinfall fractal on the Master tier.

8746.name: Master Mingler
8746.requirement: Speak with all of the partygoers during the Tyrian Alliance's celebration.
